contactCta.question: Didn't find the answer to your question?

questions.q: How long does the urban transformation process take?
questions.a: The urban transformation process typically takes 3-5 years to complete. This duration may vary depending on the project size, number of stakeholders, and municipal approval processes.

questions.q: Who covers the costs in urban transformation?
questions.a: Generally, the contractor company covers all project costs. Stakeholders typically do not make any payments and receive ownership of their new units.

questions.q: How are rights determined in urban transformation?
questions.a: Rights are determined based on the value, location, and square meters of the existing property. A fair assessment is made by professional valuation firms.

questions.q: How long does it take to prepare a property valuation report?
questions.a: A standard property valuation report is delivered within 3-7 business days. Expedited valuation service is also available for urgent cases.
Our CMB-licensed valuation reports are valid at all banks, courts, and official institutions. They can be used for loans, mortgages, sales, and legal transactions.

questions.q: How is the valuation fee determined?
questions.a: Pricing varies according to the type, size, and location of the property. You can have a free preliminary meeting for detailed information.

questions.q: What does construction consultancy service cover?
questions.a: It covers project management, quality control, cost optimization, time planning, and technical supervision services.

questions.q: What types of projects do you work on?
questions.a: We provide consultancy services for residential, commercial, industrial, and mixed-use projects.
Fees are determined based on project scope, duration, and complexity. The initial meeting and preliminary assessment are free.
We actively serve in all districts of Istanbul. Special projects in other cities can also be considered.

questions.q: Do you provide online consultancy service?
questions.a: Yes, we also offer remote consultancy service through online meetings and digital documents.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: In accordance with the Personal Data Protection Law No. 6698 ('KVKK'), we would like to inform you about the processing of your personal data.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: Your personal data will be processed by Piran Real Estate Consultancy as the data controller within the scope of the following explanations.

processing.title: Processing Principles
processing.content: Your personal data is processed in accordance with the following principles:
processing.item1: Compliance with law and honesty rules
processing.item2: Being accurate and up-to-date when necessary
processing.item3: Processing for specific, explicit and legitimate purposes
processing.item4: Being relevant, limited and proportionate to the purpose
processing.item5: Being kept for the period stipulated in the relevant legislation or necessary for the purpose for which they are processed

purposes.title: Processing Purposes
purposes.content: Your personal data is processed for the following purposes:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content: Your rights under Article 11 of KVKK:
rights.item1: Learn whether your personal data is being processed
rights.item2: Request information if your personal data has been processed
rights.item3: Learn the purpose of processing personal data and whether they are used in accordance with their purpose
rights.item4: Know the third parties to whom personal data is transferred domestically or abroad
rights.item5: Request correction if personal data is incomplete or incorrectly processed
rights.item6: Request deletion or destruction of personal data within the framework of the conditions stipulated in Article 7 of KVKK
rights.item7: Request notification of correction, deletion and destruction to third parties to whom personal data has been transferred
rights.item8: Object to the occurrence of a result against you by analyzing the processed data exclusively through automated systems

application.title: Application Methods
application.content: You can apply using the following methods to exercise your rights:
application.item1: In writing to our company address
application.item2: To info@pirangayrimenkul.com with registered e-mail (KEP) address, secure electronic signature or mobile signature
application.item3: In person to our company address

security.title: Security Measures
security.content: Necessary technical and administrative measures are taken for the security of your personal data. Your data is protected against unauthorized access, loss or alteration.
